name: d3-collection
description: Handy data structures for elements keyed by string.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_collection -o build/d3-collection.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-collection.js -c -m -o build/d3-collection.min.js && rm -f build/d3-collection.zip && zip -j build/d3-collection.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-collection.js build/d3-collection.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-collection.js ../d3.github.com/d3-collection.v0.1.js && cp build/d3-collection.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-collection.v0.1.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-collection.v0.1.js d3-collection.v0.1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-collection ${VERSION}" && git push
